text: honey one is Helen here today I will
share with you the recipe for the prank
bacon or fish sauce glazed pork belly
this is a really delicious recipes that
originates from the past in the old days
and one family have many children and
they cannot afford to eat meat so one
meal we have just rice with some sweet
potatoes or some garden vegetables on
some special occasion when the family
can buy some piece of pork then the
mother will make this dish very salty
she added a lot of fish sauce so
everyone can have one piece and for one
suite of whole you can eat with a lot of
rice so you get fooled faster our
generation today don't have to go
through that anymore but this dish has
become a really tasty addition to our
daily family meal and even though today
we don't add so much fish sauce anymore
the dish to make you want it with a lot
of rice it's very simple and easy to
make but the final product is extremely
delicious let's begin for this recipe I
will use hundred gram of pop belly try
to choose the one with more facts
because the dish will be really dry if
you use only lean POC bring a saucepan
of water to a boy and pop boy the pork
with some salt and vinegar for about 4
minutes this half will get rid of the
residues and the best meal in the pork
and it will make the pork firmer so it's
easier to slice later if you use a
bigger piece of pork then cook for about
5 to 8 minutes removed and rings under
cold water and then chill in the fridge
for 30 minutes or in the freezer for 10
minutes then slice thinly but not to
think chop up some scallion to 1 inch
length and thinly slice some shallots
and hot chili pepper add 1 tbsp of oil
in a large wok or pan and then
the shallots and scallions the white
patterning first sauce well for a couple
of seconds and then after three pot and
chili then transfer everything into a
wall spread the pop out on the same wok
and cook on medium heat to render the
fat I coat the pork in two batches so
every slice have a chance to touch the
bottom and which will render out the fat
more quickly when one side is slightly
golden sir to render the fat on the
other side - wow look at the caliber
life is nice now add some minced garlic
and chilli and toss well for about 30
seconds
mmm it's now amazing next we're gonna
add a tablespoon of soy sauce and then a
pinch of sugar to balance out the
saltiness and so well it's really bubbly
finally you're gonna add the scallion
and chili back and then take off the
heat if you want to reduce the fat you
can shoot the pants so the liquid fat
will grip off transfer the pork to a
plate and serve with a sprinkle of black
pepper on top above hot steamed rice and
some pickled mustard leaves or you can
the dish look really colorful with the
red other chilies in the green of the
spring onion it's so simple to make and
I really love the camel elation on each
pork slice so good you can eat a lot of
rice
I hope you'll enjoy today's recipe and
if you give it a try please share with
me a photo on instagram with hashtag
hand recipe also join me on Facebook and
Instagram for more daily updates of
Vietnamese food thank you so much for
watching
